entry.title: the next week it is the solidarity meal for Yessenia and...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

the next week it is the solidarity meal for Yessenia and Carlos's family. chicken soup and vegetable soup, and tamales. thank you for each time supporting all the families of sanctuary for all. Thanks to your help, Carlos's family, whose process is still ongoing, can be on their feet, as they continue to fight in the appeal of their case and are awaiting their new court.

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado would also love it if y'all would...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Sanctuary4All Colorado would also love it if y'all would throw some donations Jorge's way! https://www.gofundme.com/f/keep-jorge-with-his-family

Jorge Araiza has been in sanctuary resisting deportation since December of 2019. Jorge is the father of four U.S.-born children and has lived in the U.S. for 21 years. He grew up in Denver, and practically his entire direct family is in Colorado, including his parents, siblings, and his four children. Jorge's youngest child is four years old, and needs his father.

Since Jorge is in sanctuary, he has limited opportunities to work and needs our assistance raising funds for his new lawyer after his previous lawyer unexpectedly abandoned his case in September. If you can donate please do and please share!

Jorge Araiza has been in sanctuary resisting deportation since December of 2019. He is the fa… Jorge Araiza needs your support for keep jorge with his family

entry.title: When Edna first came to a Sanctuary4All meeting, her son was...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

When Edna first came to a Sanctuary4All meeting, her son was still detained at GEO. Just a few weeks ago, he was released from on bond, but he’s still fighting a deportation case. The two of them have been attending meetings together, and now they’re raising money to help pay for his legal representation by selling enchiladas this weekend. You can support by ordering at tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-11-7

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoRepresentative Leslie HerodTHANK YOU! It’s an honor to continue fighting along side you all as I begin my third term...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoRepresentative Leslie Herod

THANK YOU! It’s an honor to continue fighting along side you all as I begin my third term as your Representative. I promise you one thing - together, we will continue moving Colorado boldly forward. It’s time to get to work.

On Wednesday, federal agents arrested Philadelphia civil rights activist Anthony 'Ant' Smith. The arrest and charges are reportedly connected to events during t...he George Floyd protests in Philly in late May. Smith was recently named one of Philly Mag's most influential people; supporters allege Pres. Trump's Justice Department is bringing politically motivated charges to silence him.

entry.title: After raising money through #SolidarityMeals, Ingrid was able to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

After raising money through #SolidarityMeals, Ingrid was able to pay her lawyer $2500 to begin work on her case. 🥳 To everyone who ordered and shared—THANK YOU. It makes a difference. But there’s still work to do. Her appeal will cost a total of $7,500. Please continue donating and sharing her gofundme. gofundme.com/f/continued-support-for-ingrid-and-family #SolidarityNotCharity #KeepFamiliesTogether

entry.title: If you are able, please support our organization by donating...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

If you are able, please support our organization by donating through Venmo (@sanctuary4all) or becoming a Patreon supporter at [https://patreon.com/sanctuary4all]. All proceeds are used to support families impacted by the US immigration system. We help cover legal costs in deportation cases and provide financial relief and compensation (due to lost income) for individuals in sanctuary.

Next month we will be relaunching our Patreon with the intent of sharing the stories and experiences of impacted people. Please stay turned. In the meantime please contribute to our Venmo and share this with others ❤️

entry.title: https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/

Abolish ICE Denver

URGENT ALERT (English translation follows)

Alerta familias del Distrito de DPS tenemos información de que ICE está utilizando nuevas tácticas haciendo llamadas... haciéndose pasar por maestros pidiendo su información para el programa de visitas en casa por favor de no dar ningún tipo de información verifiquen en la escuela de sus hijos si saben de alguna familia que les han echo estas llamadas haciéndose pasar por los maestros de sus hijos déjenos saber o si alguien a sido detenido bajo este engañó contácteme para proveer apoyo teléfono #720 329 06 57 esta información a sido confirmada por Susana Cordova Superintendents de DPS y nuestra responsabilidad es prevenir a nuestras comunidades y familias . Recuerden tener el número de respuesta rápida en caso de interacción con ICE es el #1844 864 83 41 opción #1 para redadas daremos seguimiento a esto y no compartan información sin verificar con los maestros de sus hijos y la escuela

________________________________

ALERT: Families of Denver Public School district:
We have information that ICE is using new tactics: making calls posing as teachers asking for their information for the home visits program. Please do not give any type of information! Check with your children's school!

If you know of any family who have received these calls from people posing as the teachers of their children, let us know; or if someone has been arrested under this deception contact Jeanette Vizguerra! This information has been confirmed by Susana Cordova, Superintendent of DPS.

Our responsibility is to protect our communities and families. Remember to have the quick response number in case of interaction with ICE: (844) 864-8341 option #1 for raids

See More
